title: (x) Nintendo Gamecube - (similar to) Bank Gothic {Adriano S}
content:
[http://www.nintendo.com/img/systems/logo\_gamecube.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201030020/http:/www.nintendo.com/img/systems/logo_gamecube.gif)   
   
What the typeface used on NINTENDO GAMECUBE logo?

 [‹ (x) Duchy Originals - calligraphy {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201030020/http:/typophile.com/node/3566 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Eddmond - Eurostile Ext {Mike Y, Karl} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201030020/http:/typophile.com/node/3557 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: Looks custom, but you could get pretty close by tinkering with [Bank Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201030020/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bank-gothic) a bit.

dafont.com has a GameCube font, too. It comes with the "NINTENDO" lettering, too.   
 [http://dafont.com/en/search.php?nq=1&q=Gamecube](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201030020/http:/dafont.com/en/search.php?nq=1&q=Gamecube)
